verses.text_plain: Now these are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war.
verses.verse_html:
1Now these are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war. ▼
▼ while…: Heb. being yet shut up

tokens.text: while he yet kept himself close

footnotes.body_text: ▼ while…: Heb. being yet shut up
footnotes.body_html: ▼ while…: Heb. being yet shut up

verses.text_plain: They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saul’s brethren of Benjamin.
verses.verse_html: 2They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saul’s brethren of Benjamin.

tokens.text: and could use both the right hand

verses.text_plain: The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite,
verses.verse_html:
3The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite, ▼
▼ Shemaah: or, Hasmaah

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Shemaah: or, Hasmaah

verses.text_plain: And Ismaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty; and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite,
verses.verse_html: 4And Ismaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty; and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite,

verses.text_plain: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
verses.verse_html: 5Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,

verses.text_plain: Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,
verses.verse_html: 6Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,

verses.text_plain: And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
verses.verse_html: 7And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

verses.text_plain: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
verses.verse_html:
8And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains; ▼
▼ of war: Heb. of the host
 , ▼
▼ as swift…: Heb. as the roes upon the mountains to make haste

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of war: Heb. of the host
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of war: Heb. of the host

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as swift…: Heb. as the roes upon the mountains to make haste
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as swift…: Heb. as the roes upon the mountains to make haste

verses.text_plain: Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
verses.verse_html: 9Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,

verses.text_plain: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
verses.verse_html: 10Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,

verses.text_plain: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
verses.verse_html: 11Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,

verses.text_plain: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,
verses.verse_html: 12Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,

verses.text_plain: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.
verses.verse_html: 13Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.

verses.text_plain: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.
verses.verse_html:
14These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand. ▼
▼ one…: or, one that was least could resist an hundred, and the greatest a thousand

footnotes.body_text: ▼ one…: or, one that was least could resist an hundred, and the greatest a thousand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ one…: or, one that was least could resist an hundred, and the greatest a thousand

verses.text_plain: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.
verses.verse_html:
15These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west. ▼
▼ overflown: Heb. filled over

footnotes.body_html: ▼ overflown: Heb. filled over

verses.text_plain: And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.
verses.verse_html: 16And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.

verses.text_plain: And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemies, seeing there is no wrong in mine hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it.
verses.verse_html:
17And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemies, seeing there is no wrong in mine hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it. ▼
▼ to meet…: Heb. before them
 , ▼
▼ be knit: Heb. be one
 , ▼
▼ wrong: or, violence

tokens.text: unto them, If ye be come

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to meet…: Heb. before them
▼ be knit: Heb. be one
▼ wrong: or, violence

verses.text_plain: Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.
verses.verse_html:
18Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band. ▼
▼ came…: Heb. clothed

tokens.text: and on thy side, thou son

footnotes.body_html: ▼ came…: Heb. clothed

verses.text_plain: And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.
verses.verse_html:
19And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads. ▼
▼ to the…: Heb. on our heads

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to the…: Heb. on our heads
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to the…: Heb. on our heads

verses.text_plain: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zilthai, captains of the thousands that were of Manasseh.
verses.verse_html: 20As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zilthai, captains of the thousands that were of Manasseh.

verses.text_plain: And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.
verses.verse_html:
21And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host. ▼
▼ against…: or, with a band

footnotes.body_html: ▼ against…: or, with a band

verses.text_plain: For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.
verses.verse_html: 22For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.

verses.text_plain: And these are the numbers of the bands that were ready armed to the war, and came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
23And these are the numbers of the bands that were ready armed to the war, and came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the Lord. ▼
▼ bands: or, captains, or, men: Heb. heads

tokens.text: to him, according to the word

footnotes.body_text: ▼ bands: or, captains, or, men: Heb. heads
footnotes.body_html: ▼ bands: or, captains, or, men: Heb. heads

verses.text_plain: The children of Judah that bare shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, ready armed to the war.
verses.verse_html:
24The children of Judah that bare shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, ready armed to the war. ▼
▼ armed: or, prepared

footnotes.body_html: ▼ armed: or, prepared

verses.text_plain: Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.
verses.verse_html: 25Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.

verses.text_plain: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.
verses.verse_html: 26Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.

verses.text_plain: And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;
verses.verse_html: 27And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;

verses.text_plain: And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father’s house twenty and two captains.
verses.verse_html: 28And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father’s house twenty and two captains.

verses.text_plain: And of the children of Benjamin, the kindred of Saul, three thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of the house of Saul.
verses.verse_html:
29And of the children of Benjamin, the kindred of Saul, three thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of the house of Saul. ▼
▼ kindred: Heb. brethren
 , ▼
▼ the greatest…: Heb. a multitude of them

footnotes.body_html: ▼ kindred: Heb. brethren

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the greatest…: Heb. a multitude of them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the greatest…: Heb. a multitude of them

verses.text_plain: And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous throughout the house of their fathers.
verses.verse_html:
30And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous throughout the house of their fathers. ▼
▼ famous: Heb. men of names

footnotes.body_html: ▼ famous: Heb. men of names

verses.text_plain: And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, which were expressed by name, to come and make David king.
verses.verse_html: 31And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, which were expressed by name, to come and make David king.

verses.text_plain: And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.
verses.verse_html: 32And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.

verses.text_plain: Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart.
verses.verse_html:
33Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart. ▼
▼ expert…: or, rangers of battle, or, ranged in battle
 , ▼
▼ keep…: or, set the battle in array
 , ▼
▼ not…: Heb. without a heart and a heart

footnotes.body_text: ▼ expert…: or, rangers of battle, or, ranged in battle
footnotes.body_html: ▼ expert…: or, rangers of battle, or, ranged in battle

footnotes.body_text: ▼ keep…: or, set the battle in array
footnotes.body_html: ▼ keep…: or, set the battle in array

footnotes.body_text: ▼ not…: Heb. without a heart and a heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ not…: Heb. without a heart and a heart

verses.text_plain: And of Naphtali a thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty and seven thousand.
verses.verse_html: 34And of Naphtali a thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty and seven thousand.

verses.text_plain: And of the Danites expert in war twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.
verses.verse_html: 35And of the Danites expert in war twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.

verses.text_plain: And of Asher, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, forty thousand.
verses.verse_html:
36And of Asher, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, forty thousand. ▼
▼ expert: or, keeping their rank

footnotes.body_html: ▼ expert: or, keeping their rank

verses.text_plain: And on the other side of Jordan, of the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and of the half tribe of Manasseh, with all manner of instruments of war for the battle, an hundred and twenty thousand.
verses.verse_html: 37And on the other side of Jordan, of the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and of the half tribe of Manasseh, with all manner of instruments of war for the battle, an hundred and twenty thousand.

verses.text_plain: All these men of war, that could keep rank, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.
verses.verse_html: 38All these men of war, that could keep rank, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.

verses.text_plain: And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.
verses.verse_html: 39And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.

tokens.text: And there they were with David

verses.text_plain: Moreover they that were nigh them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, and meat, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel.
verses.verse_html:
40Moreover they that were nigh them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, and meat, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel. ▼
▼ meat…: or, victual of meal

tokens.text: of figs, and bunches of raisins

footnotes.body_html: ▼ meat…: or, victual of meal
